walletHelp: First get some Hydro to use by clicking the 'Get Hydro Tokens' button below.
getHydroHelp: Once you get your Hydro tokens, deposit them into your Snowflake below. For instance, if you requested 5,000 tokens, enter 5,000 into the deposit box.
ethWalletHelp: Link an Ethereum wallet to your Snowflake.
identityHelp: This is your Snowflake EIN. Update your public Snowflake status below.
